height.description: The height of the block in the blockchain.

pollId.description: The id of the poll that this block belongs to.

timestamp.description: The time at which this block was mined.

rewardAddress.description: The address to which the reward for this block will go to.

nonce.description: An arbitrary number used for mining.

prevHash.description: Hash of the block previous to this block.

responses.description: An array of poll response objects that are locked in the block.
